Class GeometryCodes

  • java.lang.Object

        Returns:
        true is has M

      • getGeometryMode

        public static int getGeometryMode​(int code)
        Get the geometry mode from the geometry code. Returns the digit in the thousands place. (z is enabled when 1 or 3, m is enabled when 2 or 3)
        Parameters:
        code - geometry code
        Returns:
        geometry mode
